parameters.functionCode:
const orderData = $input.first().json;

// Format the data for Supabase insert
const supabaseData = {
  amazon_order_id: orderData.amazonOrderId,
  processing_id: `order_${orderData.amazonOrderId}_${Date.now()}`,
  status: 'queued_for_processing',
  workflow_step: 'order_intake',
  next_workflow: '2.A.-bria-submit',
  order_status: orderData.orderStatus,
  purchase_date: orderData.purchaseDate,
  order_total: parseFloat(orderData.orderTotal),
  currency: orderData.currency,
  marketplace_id: orderData.marketplaceId,
  customer_email: orderData.customerEmail,
  customer_name: orderData.customerName,
  shipping_address: orderData.shippingAddress,
  character_specs: orderData.characterSpecs,
  character_hash: orderData.characterHash,
  product_info: orderData.productInfo,
  priority: 'normal',
  estimated_processing_time: '30-45 minutes',
  created_at: orderData.createdAt,
  updated_at: new Date().toISOString(),
  queued_at: new Date().toISOString(),
  validated_at: orderData.validatedAt,
  validation_errors: orderData.validationErrors
};

console.log(`Formatted order data for Supabase: ${supabaseData.amazon_order_id}`);
return [{ json: supabaseData }];
